trans-unit.source: Diagnosing issues with an Microsoft Azure cloud service requires collecting the service’s log files on virtual machines as the issues occur.
trans-unit.target: Diagnosing issues with an Microsoft Azure cloud service requires collecting the service’s log files on virtual machines as the issues occur.

trans-unit.source: You can use the AzureLogCollector extension on-demand to perfom one-time collection of logs from one or more Cloud Service VMs (from both web roles and worker roles) and transfer the collected files to an Azure storage account – all without remotely logging on to any of the VMs.
trans-unit.target: You can use the AzureLogCollector extension on-demand to perfom one-time collection of logs from one or more Cloud Service VMs (from both web roles and worker roles) and transfer the collected files to an Azure storage account – all without remotely logging on to any of the VMs.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]Descriptions for most of the logged information can be found at http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kwill/archive/2013/08/09/windows-azure-paas-compute-diagnostics-data.asp.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]Descriptions for most of the logged information can be found at http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kwill/archive/2013/08/09/windows-azure-paas-compute-diagnostics-data.asp.

trans-unit.source: There are two modes of collection dependent on the types of files to be collected.
trans-unit.target: There are two modes of collection dependent on the types of files to be collected.

trans-unit.source: This collection mode includes all the logs related to Azure guest agents and other Azure components.
trans-unit.target: This collection mode includes all the logs related to Azure guest agents and other Azure components.

trans-unit.source: This collection mode will collect all files in GA mode plus:
trans-unit.target: This collection mode will collect all files in GA mode plus:

trans-unit.source: In both collection modes, additional data collection folders can be specified by using a collection of the following structure:
trans-unit.target: In both collection modes, additional data collection folders can be specified by using a collection of the following structure:

trans-unit.source: **Name**: The name of the collection, which will be used as the name of subfolder inside the zip file to be collected.
trans-unit.target: **Name**: The name of the collection, which will be used as the name of subfolder inside the zip file to be collected.

trans-unit.source: **Location**: The path to the folder on the virtual machine where file will be collected.
trans-unit.target: **Location**: The path to the folder on the virtual machine where file will be collected.

trans-unit.source: **SearchPattern**: The pattern of the names of files to be collected.
trans-unit.target: **SearchPattern**: The pattern of the names of files to be collected.

trans-unit.source: **Recursive**: if the files will be collected recursively under the folder.
trans-unit.target: **Recursive**: if the files will be collected recursively under the folder.
